name: Chop Chop Slicer
description:
Make sure you download NINJA NATIONS! It's our best game ever, it's brand new and it's free!

----------------------------------------------

SLICE ‘EM ALL!

“a Must-Have” – Slide to Play
“Maddeningly Addictive” – Gamezebo
“You won’t be disappointed!” – iPhone Life
“Unique and Strangely addictive” – AppSpy

Your spaceship has crashed on a hostile planet! You must defend yourself against waves and waves of enemies with your powerful weapon: your slicing finger! Cut through your enemies as precisely as possible!

But be careful of that pink octopus…

Features:
*An action-packed game
*Very precise slicing action
*Physics Dynamics
*3 game modes
*Easy to play
*39 achievements to unlock

Join the community on Facebook: www.facebook.com/gamerizon
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/gamerizon

Chop Chop Slicer™ is a trademark from Gamerizon Studios Inc.
